title: Three Tier Hexagon Silver Acrylic Mirror Cake Stand 23cm 19cm 15cm (overall 32cm) (6inch 7.5inch & 9inch height 12.5inch) (approx 24 cup cakes)
features: Three Tier Hexagon Silver Acrylic Mirror Cake Stand 23cm 19cm 15cm (overall 32cm)

Comes flatpacked and assembled by slotting together (no need for glue).Â Dismantle for easy flat storage.
Brilliant for displaying all types of foods from starters to deserts & cup cakes. Easy to put up and take down for storage, takes up minimal space when packed away!
